thread.title: Air4casts - The New Generation Team

author: eTN Editor
title: Air4casts - The New Generation Team
text:
Air4casts - The New Generation Team   
Oct 08, 2015 eTN   
Air4casts has appointed sisters Emma and Sarah Robinson to pivotal management roles within the Company. 
Emma joined the company in 2013 after gaining a First Class BA Honors in French from University College London, and is now joined by Sarah, fresh from a Double First in French and German at King’s College London. 
Sarah takes up the role of Commercial Director, an appointment greatly anticipated by the whole Air4casts team, but particularly by Emma, who is expanding her position as Marketing Director to encompass management of the company’s newest product innovations. 
Managing Director, Jane Robinson, commented “I am delighted that Emma and Sarah have both joined Air4casts at such a positive time in the company’s development. They are highly qualified and passionate about Air4casts’ continued progress in the industry.” 
The Air4casts team is looking forward to an exciting future with the company in capable hands and a commitment to both its long-established Big Data handling and wide-ranging modernization.
